heading: Schezwan Potato Coins
ingredient: 3-4 tbsp schezwan chutney or schezwan sauce
method: Take one bowl..add besan, maida, corn flour, spinach, green chili, ginger, schezwan chutney, salt and pepper. Add water and make thick batter.
Boil and slice 2 potatoes.
Put the potato slices in the batter. Coat them nice and evenly.

Heat non-stick pan. Pour 2 tablespoon of oil in it. Place coated potato slices on the non-stick pan. Cook for 30 sec on one side. Flip another side and cook till the golden brown. .pour 1 teaspoon of oil if needed.
for a dip ..Mix tomato sauce and schezwan chutney in one bowl.
Serve hot with dip.

heading: Tomcorn Pasta Soup
ingredient: Boiled Tomato puree ( 6 tomatoes blanched, peeled and pureed)
3 to 4 tbsp corn flour slurry ( 1 tbsp corn flour mix with 3 tbsp water)
method: Heat a saucepan or a kadai. Add oil and garlic. Saute it for a while. Add chopped onion. Saute it for 2 min. Add aaji no motto, boiled corn, tomato puree and ½ cup of water. Mix them properly. Add oregano, chili flakes, salt and paper powder. Stir continuously. Cook on low flame for 3-4 minutes.
Now, add sugar, boiled pasta, spring onion and corn flour slurry. Now stir continuously. Add water and check the consistency. Simmer for 5 minutes on low flame.
Serve hot with coriander and garlic toast.

heading: Dhaba Style Chur Chur Naan
ingredient: 1/2 cup pure ghee or as needed

heading: Moongdal Ki Pakodi/Dal Ke
method: wash the moongdal with the water, twice. Soak the moongdal for 1 hour.
drain the moongdal.
take grinder jar. Add drained dal, ginger, spicy green chillies, salt and hing. Add 3-4 tbsp water. Grind to a smooth paste… Don’t add much water..
we want dropping consistency batter, not runny. So take care while adding water.
Transfer this to a mixing bowl. Add chopped palak, methi, curry leaves and jeera. Mix them really well.
mix well with your hand. Check salt and add more, if needed.
Heat oil in a kadai. When it is a hot, drop a small pakodi to the oil. It will sink and rise..it means your oil is ready.
Drop small bite sized pakodi of the mixture to the hot oil.
fry them till golden and crisp in medium flame.
enjoy hot with green chutney.

Easy Whole Wheat Dry Fruit Cake / Kadai Cake / No Butter No Sugar No Maida Cake
Easy Whole Wheat Dry Fruit Cake / Kadai Cake / No Butter No Sugar No Maida Cake

ingredient: 1 cup mixed dryfruits and nuts, chopped (dry apricots,almond, cashews,walnuts,dry plums,green raisins, pistachios etc)
topping: 1/2 cup mixed dry fruits and nuts, chopped
method: Take one bowl. Seive flour,baking soda and baking powder. keep aside. (Dry ingredients)
take another bowl. Whisk oil, Jaggery,milk , vanilla essence and salt together. Whisk well till Jaggery dilutes. ( Wet ingredients)
grease cake tin with few drops of oil. Dust with the flour.. gently tap and Remove axcess flour.
Pour wet ingredients into the dry ingredients. Mix well.
Add dry fruits and nuts. Mix well. Add 3 tablespoon of water if needed. Consistency should be dropping.
preheat kadai at slow flame for 10 min. Keep steel stand or steel ring in the kadai. Put your cake tin on it. Bake in preheated kadai for 40- 45 min. At slow to medium flame. Cover with the lid.
OR bake in preheated oven on 180 C for 30 -40 min.
After 40 – 45 min.check with the toothpick, if it’s comes out clean, your cake is ready…if not, bake for another 5 -10 min.
Remove from the kadai and rest it for 30 min.
After 30 min. Gently turn the tin and remove the cake.
Enjoy.

heading: Easy Oreo Kulfie
method: heat full cream milk in a deep non-stick pan.
let it boil. After one boil, simmer at a slow flame for 15-20 min….stir continuously..
After 15-20 min…you can see the quantity of the milk became almost half.
Mix 1 tablespoon of rice flour in 1/4 cup of milk. Mix properly.
Add this mixture gradually into the boiled milk. ..stir continuously..
Add sugar..mix well for 1 min
Remove from the flame.
keep aside for 1 hour.
Coarsely Grind 5 Oreo cookies…add into the kulfi’mixture.
pour the mixture into kulfi moulds..if you don’t have kulfi moulds, you can use any plastic container to set the kulfi..
set for 10-12 hours in refrigerator (Freezer section).
enjoy.

heading: Iranian Rice Cookies
ingredient: 1 tbsp rose water or 2-3 drops rose essance
2 tablespoon sesame seeds for sprinkle on top of the cookies
2 tablespoon rose syrup for decoration ( optional)
method: Take one bowl. Mix Rice flour and baking powder… keep aside.
Take another bowl. Mix butter and sugar. Whisk until creamy.
add rose water and mix well. Then add flour and gently Knead a dough. If it is too crumbly, add few drops of milk. My dough consistency was right, so I didn’t use Milk.
Roll out into equal sized balls and press gently with your palm. Using fork,make criss cross patterns on the cookies, sprinkle sesame seeds..
Bake in a preheated oven at 170′ C for 10 to 12 min. till the side turn golden brown.
Remove from the oven and let the cookies rest in the tray for a 10 minutes.
Gently transfer the cookies to a wire rack to cool….
Cookies are made from rice flour. They are gluten free..so, it’s very delicate to handle.
Make sure cookies are completely cool…then after you can store them in air tight container..
Decorate the cookies with rose syrup..it’s optional.

heading: Minty Whole Wheat Namakpara
method: Take one mixing bowl. Combine flour, sooji, mint leaves, salt, red chilli flakes, Turmeric powder, jeera, Ajwain and hot ghee and start mixing with fingers to crumble them well.
Gradually, add water and start kneading the dough. The dough should be like poori dough. Do not add too much at a time as we need firm dough..it should be soft.
Cover and rest the dough for 30 min.
Heat oil in a deep kadai.
Once the dough is ready, divide into equal balls. Take one ball and roll out into a circle with thickness of 4-5 m.m.
Cut the rolled circle into diamond shapes with the help of a knife.
Fry all the diamonds till golden brown and crispy at medium low flame.
Don’t over fry them or don’t fry them on very high flame heat as it will burn.
drain the namakpara onto absorbent paper. Repeat the same process with rest of the balls.
cool them completely. store them in a clean and airtight container.
serve with coffee or tea.

heading: Instant Whole Wheat Mug Brownie
method: Take one small microwave safe mug. ( If you have a big mug then, double the ingredients)
Add brown sugar and Milk. Mix well until sugar dissolves. I used brown sugar because it gives my brownie a chewy texture. ( You can use White sugar or Jaggery prowder also in a same proportion)
Add oil, whole wheat flour, Cocoa powder, baking powder, pinch of salt and vanilla essance.
Mix well until smooth. Batter should be at runny consistency. Add more Milk if needed.
Microwave for 1 min. I have 1200w microwave,so my brownie was ready in 1 min..but if you have microwave is less than 1200w ,it may take time to 1.5 -2 min. to cook the brownie.
Garnish your brownie with anything. You can garnish with whip cream or vanilla ice cream. You can add some chocolate chips and walnuts also…
serve hot.

heading: Veggie Stuffed Buns
method: Take buns and hollow out the center. Keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan. Add onions and broccoli. Saute them for 1 min.
Add rest of the veggies. Saute well for 2-3 min.
Add salt, Chili powder, oregano and pepper powder. Mix well. Remove from the flame.
Add mayonnaise and tomato ketchup..mix well..
Take one cheese slice and cut it into 4 parts.( Now we have 4 small cheese slices)
Take one scooped bun.. put 2 tablespoon of the mixture in the middle of the bun.. put cut cheese slice over it. Sprinkle some chili flakes and oregano. Stuff all the buns.
Spread 1/4 tsp of butter on each whole stuffed bun.
Take greased Baking tray, place all the buns and bake them for 180′ C for 5 min.
On a slow flame, Roast the buns on the non-stick tava with butter.
Serve hot or warm …
